title: over 1k random ping spike wont go away
body: ive NEVER lagged like this before i have no idea whats going on my ping was fine last game now all of a sudden its through the roof, the really weird thing about it is that i can see what the rest of my team and enemy team is doing in real time with no lag at all but whenever i try to do anything its lagged severely i have no idea whats going on please help

replies.body: Getting the same issue as of the most recent patch. Flushed my DNS, rebooted my modem/router, when I run a CMD ping to either NA or LAN I get around 1-4% packet loss.

Rebooting your network real quick is a good first step to take. You can do this by unplugging your modem and/or router for 30+ seconds, as *Jasiwel* mentioned, before plugging them back in. If you continue to see increased latency in-game, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure that you aren't running any network settings that could cause a poor connection to our servers.

Please let me know if this helped.

Have you tried the following:

1.) Have you flushed your DNS? 

2.) Turned off your Router, waited 30 seconds, turned it back on?

3.) Cleared internet cache data from your browser (it's helped me in the past)?

Just the main three solutions I've tried and have improved my situation. You might also want to check with your ISP as well, if all else fails.
